content.body: OK, so I'm trying to test Timing-Allow-Origin behavior of an opaque origin iframe, and realizing there's no way for me to communicate the test results from iframe to parent (as it's a cross-origin frame). Is there some way for me to communicate that info? Or somehow set Access-Control-Allow-Origin on a data URI iframe?
@Domenic yeah, dumb question. Wasn't working for me for some reason, but working now
